name: Modern Desk Lamp
description: A sleek, adjustable desk lamp with touch controls and multiple brightness settings. Perfect for your home office or reading nook.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Premium wireless earbuds with noise cancellation, water resistance, and 8-hour battery life. Includes compact charging case.

name: Minimalist Watch
description: Elegant timepiece with a clean dial, premium leather strap, and Japanese quartz movement. Water-resistant to 30 meters.

name: Ceramic Plant Pot
description: Hand-crafted ceramic pot with drainage hole and saucer. Available in matte finish with subtle texture. Perfect for indoor plants.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Compact speaker with powerful sound, 12-hour battery life, and water resistance. Connects easily to all your devices.

name: Leather Notebook
description: Premium leather-bound notebook with 192 pages of acid-free paper. Includes bookmark ribbon and elastic closure.

name: Smart Water Bottle
description: Insulated water bottle with LED temperature display and hydration tracking. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.

name: Wool Throw Blanket
description: Soft, lightweight throw blanket made from 100% merino wool. Perfect for adding warmth and texture to any room.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Double-walled, vacuum-insulated water bottle that keeps beverages cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and leak-proof.

name: Bamboo Cutting Board
description: Sustainable bamboo cutting board with juice groove and handles. Naturally antibacterial and gentle on knives.

name: Scented Candle Set
description: Set of three hand-poured soy wax candles in amber glass jars. Fragrances include Sandalwood, Vanilla, and Cedar.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Slim, fast-charging wireless pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Features LED indicator and non-slip surface.

name: Cotton Throw Pillow
description: Soft, decorative pillow with removable cover made from 100% organic cotton. Available in neutral tones to complement any decor.

name: Glass Tea Infuser
description: Double-walled glass tea infuser with removable stainless steel filter. Perfect for loose leaf tea and herbal infusions.

name: Wooden Desk Organizer
description: Handcrafted desk organizer with multiple compartments for stationery, devices, and accessories. Made from sustainable bamboo.

name: Linen Napkin Set
description: Set of four stonewashed linen napkins with mitered corners. Soft, absorbent, and becomes more beautiful with each wash.

name: Coffee Mug Set
description: Set of two ceramic coffee mugs with ergonomic handles. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Perfect for your morning routine.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly TPE material. Provides excellent cushioning and grip for all types of yoga practice.

name: Reading Glasses
description: Stylish reading glasses with anti-blue light coating. Lightweight frame with spring hinges for comfortable all-day wear.

name: Kitchen Scale
description: Digital kitchen scale with precision weighing up to 11 lbs. Features tare function and easy-to-read LCD display.

name: Desk Fan
description: Compact USB desk fan with adjustable speed settings. Quiet operation and 360-degree rotation for optimal airflow.

name: Phone Stand
description: Adjustable phone stand made from aluminum alloy. Compatible with all smartphone sizes and provides stable viewing angles.

name: Essential Oil Diffuser
description: Ultrasonic essential oil diffuser with LED mood lighting. Runs for up to 8 hours and covers rooms up to 300 sq ft.

name: Travel Backpack
description: Durable travel backpack with multiple compartments and laptop sleeve. Water-resistant material with comfortable padded straps.
